1    | /*---------------------------------------
2    |   WN_DEBUG.C
3    | ---------------------------------------*/
4    | 
5    | #include <stdarg.h>
6    | #include "video/v_video.h"
7    | #include "window.h"
8    | 
9    | extern SCREEN _cursvar;
10   | 
11   | /*#+func-----------------------------------------------------------------------
12   |     FUNCTION: wn_debug()
13   |      PURPOSE: send debug information to debug window
14   |       SYNTAX: int wn_debug(WINDOWPTR w, char *format, ...);
15   |  DESCRIPTION:
16   |      RETURNS: NO_WINDOW: window not opened
17   |               TRUE     : all ok
18   |      HISTORY: 21-Nov-1992 21:43:43 V
19   | --#-func----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
20   | int wn_debug(char *format, ...)
21   | {
22   |   va_list arguments;
23   |   static int first_time = TRUE;
24   |   static WINDOW *debug_window;
25   |   int old_mon;
26   |   char s[132];
27   | 
28   |   /*---------------------------
29   |     Switch to second monitor
30   |   ---------------------------*/
31   |   old_mon = monitor;
32   |   wn_monitor(MONITOR_2);
33   | 
34   |   if (first_time) {
35   |     debug_window = wn_open(_DOUBLE_LINE,0,0,_cursvar.cols,_cursvar.lines,
36   |                    16*BLACK+WHITE,16*BLACK+WHITE);
37   |     if (!debug_window)
38   |       exit(-1);
39   |     wn_title(debug_window,"DEBUG OUTPUT");
40   |     first_time = FALSE;
41   |   }
42   | 
43   |   /*----------------------------
44   |     Make this the active window
45   |   ------------------------------*/
46   |   /*
47   |   if (debug_window != top_window)
48   |     wn_top(debug_window);
49   |   */
50   | 
51   |   /*-----------------------
52   |     Build and print string
53   |   ------------------------*/
54   |   va_start(arguments,format);
55   |   vsprintf(s,format,arguments);
56   |   va_end(arguments);
57   |   wn_printf(debug_window,"%s",s);
58   | 
59   |   /*-----------------------------
60   |     Switch to original monitor
61   |   -----------------------------*/
62   |   wn_monitor(old_mon);
63   | 
64   |   return(TRUE);
65   | }
